content:
Quick Reminder. Kubecon 2021 Cloud Native Wasm Day CFP closes today.

https://events.linuxfoundation.org/cloud-native-wasm-day-north-america/program/cfp/#overview

We'd love talks on all sorts of adjacent talks around Wasm: serverless, k8s, in production, intro, tiny, ml, app frameworks, security, ecosystem, & more! Great way to expose your project to a broad group of stakeholders.

Call For Proposals (CFP) | Linux Foundation Events
Overview The Cloud Native Wasm Day North America Call for Proposals (CFP) is now open. For any questions regarding the CFP process, please email CNCFcolocatedevents@cncf.io. SUBMIT A PROPOSAL Generalâ€¦
